short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Extension does its best to recreate the Imgur ratings bar that you know and love. (Beta)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Imgur recently released a redesign that many within the Imgur community did not like. This Chrome extension does it's best to recreate the ratings bar within the look of the new design.
